atk-s0517a11:2_0: 238. Idāni tassa maggassa maṇḍapeyyattaṁ dassentena kathitāya bhagavato vacanekadesapubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0517a11:2_1: maṇḍapeyyakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā. Tattha maṇḍapeyyanti yathā sampannaṁ nimmalaṁ
atk-s0517a11:2_2: vippasannaṁ sappi sappimaṇḍoti vuccati, evaṁ vippasannaṭṭhena maṇḍo, pātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a11:2_3: peyyaṁ. Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṁ patitā visaññino attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmikā
atk-s0517a11:2_4: honti, taṁ pasannampi na pātabbaṁ. Mayhaṁ pana idaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ
atk-s0517a11:2_5: sampannattā nimmalattā vippasannattā maṇḍañca hitasukhāvahattā peyyañcāti maṇḍapeyyanti
atk-s0517a11:2_6: dīpeti. Maṇḍo peyyo etthāti maṇḍapeyyaṁ. Kiṁ taṁ? Sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ. Kasmā sikkhattayaṁ
atk-s0517a11:2_7: brahmacariyaṁ nāma? Uttamaṭṭhena nibbānaṁ brahmaṁ nāma, sikkhattayaṁ nibbānatthāya
atk-s0517a11:2_8: pavattanato brahmatthāya cariyāti brahmacariyanti vuccati. Sāsanabrahmacariyanti
atk-s0517a11:2_9: taṁyeva. Satthāsammukhībhūtoti idamettha kāraṇavacanaṁ. Yasmā pana satthā sammukhībhūto,
atk-s0517a11:2_10: tasmā vīriyapayogaṁ katvā pivathetaṁ maṇḍaṁ. Bāhirakañhi bhesajjamaṇḍaṁ vejjassa
atk-s0517a11:2_11: asammukhā pivantānaṁ pamāṇaṁ vā uggamananiggamanaṁ vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti. Vejjassa
atk-s0517a11:2_12: sammukhā pana vejjo jānissatīti nirāsaṅkā pivanti. Evamevaṁ amhākañca dhammassāmī
atk-s0517a11:2_13: satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṁ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne sanniyojeti. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0517a11:2_14: yathārahaṁ anusāsatīti satthā. Apica “satthā bhagavā satthavāho”tiādinā niddesanayenapettha
atk-s0517a11:2_15: attho veditabbo. Sandissamāno mukho bhūtoti sammukhībhūto.
atk-s0517a11:3_0: Maṇḍapeyyaniddese tidhattamaṇḍoti tidhābhāvo tidhattaṁ. Tidhattena maṇḍo tidhattamaṇḍo,
atk-s0517a11:3_1: tividhena maṇḍoti attho. Satthari sammukhībhūteti idaṁ sabbākāraparipuṇṇamaṇḍattayadassanatthaṁ
atk-s0517a11:3_2: vuttaṁ. Parinibbutepi pana satthari ekadesena maṇḍattayaṁ pavattatiyeva. Teneva cassa
atk-s0517a11:3_3: niddese “satthari sammukhībhūte”ti avatvā katamo desanāmaṇḍotiādi vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:4: Desanāmaṇḍoti dhammadesanā eva maṇḍo. Paṭiggahamaṇḍoti desanāpaṭiggāhako eva maṇḍo. Brahmacariyamaṇḍoti maggabrahmacariyameva maṇḍo.
atk-s0517a11:5_0: Ācikkhanāti desetabbānaṁ saccādīnaṁ imāni nāmānīti nāmavasena kathanā. Desanāti dassanā.
atk-s0517a11:5_1: Paññāpanāti jānāpanā, ñāṇamukhe ṭhapanā vā. Āsanaṁ ṭhapento hi “āsanaṁ paññāpetī”ti
atk-s0517a11:5_2: vuccati. Paṭṭhapanāti paññāpanā, pavattanāti attho, ñāṇamukhe ṭhapanā vā. Vivaraṇāti
atk-s0517a11:5_3: vivaṭakaraṇaṁ, vivaritvā dassanāti attho. Vibhajanāti vibhāgakiriyā, vibhāgato dassanāti
atk-s0517a11:5_4: attho. Uttānīkammanti pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṁ. Atha vā ācikkhanāti desanādīnaṁ channaṁ
atk-s0517a11:5_5: padānaṁ mūlapadaṁ. Desanādīni cha padāni tassa atthavivaraṇatthaṁ vuttāni. Tattha
atk-s0517a11:5_6: desanāti ugghaṭitaññūnaṁ vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamaṁ uddesavasena desanā. Ugghaṭitaññū
atk-s0517a11:5_7: hi saṅkhepena vuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttañca paṭivijjhanti. Paññāpanāti vipañcitaññūnaṁ
atk-s0517a11:5_8: vasena tesaṁ cittatosanena buddhinisānena ca paṭhamaṁ saṅkhittassa vitthārato niddesavasena
atk-s0517a11:5_9: paññāpanā. Paṭṭhapanāti tesaṁyeva niddiṭṭhassa niddesassa paṭiniddesavasena vitthārataravacanena
atk-s0517a11:5_10: paññāpanā. Vivaraṇāti niddiṭṭhassāpi punappunaṁ vacanena vivaraṇā. Vibhajanāti punappunaṁ
atk-s0517a11:5_11: vuttassāpi vibhāgakaraṇena vibhajanā. Uttānīkammanti vivaṭassa vitthārataravacanena,
atk-s0517a11:5_12: vibhattassa ca nidassanavacanena uttānīkaraṇaṁ. Ayaṁ desanā neyyānampi paṭivedhāya
atk-s0517a11:5_13: hoti. Yevāpanaññepi kecīti piyaṅkaramātādikā vinipātikā gahitā. Viññātāroti paṭivedhavasena
atk-s0517a11:5_14: lokuttaradhammaṁ viññātāro. Ete hi bhikkhuādayo paṭivedhavasena dhammadesanaṁ paṭiggaṇhantīti
atk-s0517a11:5_15: paṭiggahā. Ayamevātiādīni paṭhamañāṇaniddese vuttatthāni. Ariyamaggo nibbānena saṁsandanato
atk-s0517a11:6_0: 239. Idāni adhimokkhamaṇḍotiādīhi tasmiṁ maggakkhaṇe vijjamānāni indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni
atk-s0517a11:6_1: maṇḍapeyyavidhāne yojetvā dasseti. Tattha adhimokkhamaṇḍoti adhimokkhasaṅkhāto maṇḍo.
atk-s0517a11:6_2: Kasaṭoti pasādavirahito āvilo. Chaḍḍetvāti samucchedavasena pahāya. Saddhindriyassa
atk-s0517a11:6_3: adhimokkhamaṇḍaṁ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyanti saddhindriyato adhimokkhamaṇḍassa anaññattepi
atk-s0517a11:6_4: sati aññaṁ viya katvā vohāravasena vuccati, yathā loke nisadapotako nisadapotasarīrassa
atk-s0517a11:6_5: anaññattepi sati nisadapotassa sarīranti vuccati, yathā ca pāḷiyaṁ “phusitatta”ntiādīsu
atk-s0517a11:6_6: dhammato anaññopi bhāvo añño viya vutto, yathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “phusanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0517a11:6_7: phasso”tiādīsu dhammato anaññampi lakkhaṇaṁ aññaṁ viya vuttaṁ, evamidanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:6_8: Pivatīti cettha taṁsamaṅgipuggaloti vuttaṁ hoti. Taṁsamaṅgipuggalo taṁ maṇḍaṁ pivatīti
atk-s0517a11:6_9: katvā tena puggalena so maṇḍo pātabbato maṇḍapeyyaṁ nāma hotīti vuttaṁ hoti. “Maṇḍapeyyo”ti
atk-s0517a11:6_10: ca vattabbe “maṇḍapeyya”nti liṅgavipallāso kato. Sesānampi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a11:6_11: Apubbesu pana pariḷāhoti pīṇanalakkhaṇāya pītiyā paṭipakkho kilesasantāpo. Duṭṭhullanti
atk-s0517a11:6_12: upasamapaṭipakkho kilesavasena oḷārikabhāvo asantabhāvo. Appaṭisaṅkhāti paṭisaṅkhānapaṭipakkho
atk-s0517a11:7_0: 240. Puna aññena pariyāyena maṇḍapeyyavidhiṁ niddisitukāmo atthi maṇḍotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a11:7_1: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṁ saddhindriye. Attharasotiādīsu saddhindriyassa adhimuccanaṁ
atk-s0517a11:7_2: attho, saddhindriyaṁ dhammo, tadeva nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimutti, tassa atthassa
atk-s0517a11:7_3: sampatti attharaso. Tassa dhammassa sampatti dhammaraso. Tassā vimuttiyā sampatti
atk-s0517a11:7_4: vimuttiraso. Atha vā atthapaṭilābharati attharaso, dhammapaṭilābharati dhammaraso,
atk-s0517a11:7_5: vimuttipaṭilābharati vimuttiraso. Ratīti ca taṁsampayuttā, tadārammaṇā vā pīti. Iminā
atk-s0517a11:7_6: nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo. Imasmiṁ pariyāye maṇḍassa peyyaṁ maṇḍapeyyanti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a11:8_1: maṇḍapeyyaṁ dassetvā puna ante ṭhitaṁ brahmacariyamaṇḍaṁ dassento maggassa padhānattā
atk-s0517a11:8_2: maggaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā uppaṭipāṭivasena maggaṅgabojjhaṅgabalaindriyāni dassesi.
atk-s0517a11:8_3: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maṇḍotiādayo yathāyogaṁ lokiyalokuttarā maṇḍā. Taṁ heṭṭhā
atk-s0517a11:8_4: vuttanayena veditabbaṁ. Tathaṭṭhena saccā maṇḍoti ettha pana dukkhasamudayānaṁ maṇḍattābhāvā
atk-s0517a11:8_5: mahāhatthipadasutte viya saccañāṇāni saccāti vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
